The exception is not very helpful because it does not state which context ID
could not be displayed.

I propose the following change to WorkbenchHelp#setHelp(IAction action, contextId):

@@@@

	public static void setHelp(IAction action, final String contextId) {
		action.setHelpListener(new HelpListener() {
			public void helpRequested(HelpEvent event) {
				if (getHelpUI() != null) {
					IContext context = HelpSystem.getContext(contextId);
					if (context == null) throw new IllegalArgumentExeption("no help context \'"
+ contextID + "\' registered");
					Point point = computePopUpLocation(event.widget.getDisplay());
					displayContext(context, point.x, point.y);
				}
			}
		});
	}

@@@@

The message should be internationalized.
